page.title: 12PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: { Tig Circle} { ___________} The person who is on stands in the centre of the playground and calls out someone's name.That person races across the yard without being tigged. If tigged,he is on with the other person.When everyone has been tigged, a new game starts led by the first person tigged in the previous game. { { Donkey} { _______} You need a high wall,a tennis ball and two or more players.Throw the ball at the wall,jump it when it rebounds without letting it bounce or touch you.The next person catches the ball and does the same.If the ball touches you,you get a{"D"},then an{"O"}.If you spell{"DONKEY"}you are out.
